channel.title: johnjohnston tweets
channel.description: A feed of recent tweets from johnjohnston.

item.description: This Miniature Sculpture Court was pretty much hidden under a sycamore in the woodlands trust place at Overtoun. I only found it following the dry stane dyke, trying to spot a lizard. Very neatly made. https://t.co/UKaBkavTyF

Why your ability to repair a tractor could also be a matter of life and death John Naughton covers John Deere tractors. I’ve talked about this to the odd young farmers in my class as a reason to learn about tech. In the future you’ll need to hack ... https://t.co/Ggdfu5tQsg
Another walk at Glen Finlas, round the loop this time. Notes, map and photos walkmap Blue skies, midges and some wildlife. https://t.co/JgIL4F5tOE https://t.co/WtuRLhPrIl

A walk around Ardinning this afternoon, bright, sunny and a bit of a breeze. Saw Common blue damselflies (as far as I can figure), and a couple of distant dragonflies. First for me this year. https://t.co/wW5xZmnD2W https://t.co/3Q9m92f7sD

How can the Royal Family push their #QueensGreenCanopy project whilst the Duchies of Cornwall and Lancaster refuse to discuss rewilding their land with @wildcardrewild #PlatinumJubilee #RewildTheRoyals

The Biggies had a bit of fun thinking about what that would do if they were good or bad rulers. Making graphics with layers, transparency, copyright free images, clip art an their own photos. https://t.co/ojA7risHxd
